text: Yar vatti (vankit) tinkirarkalo, avarkal (marumaiyil) saittanal tintappatta oruvan paittiyam pitittavanaka eluvatu polallamal (veruvitamay ela mattarkal; itarkuk karanam avarkal, "niccayamaka viyaparam vattiyaip ponrate" enru kuriyatinaleyam. Allah viyaparattai halalakki, vattiyai haramakkiyirukkiran;. Ayinum yar tan iraivanitamiruntu narpotanai vanta pin atai vittum vilakivitukirano, avanukku munnar vankiyatu urittanatu - enralum avanutaiya vivakaram allahvitam irukkiratu. Anal yar (narpotanai perra pinnar ippavattin pal) tirumpukirarkalo avarkal narakavacikal. Avarkal; avarkal atil enrenrum tankivituvarkal
